content: विपक्ष {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Hostile, inimical, adverse, contrary. --क्षः {@--1@} An enemy, adversary, opponent; गुणास्तस्य विपक्षेपि गुणिनो लेभिरेंतरं <ls>R. 17. 75</ls>; <ls>Śi. 11. 59.</ls> {@--2@} A rival or fellow wife; <ls>R. 19. 20.</ls> {@--3@} A disputant; <ls>Ki. 17. 43.</ls> {@--4@} (In logic) A negative instance, an instance on the opposite side, ({%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} that in which the साध्य or major term is not found); निश्चितसाध्याभाववान् विपक्षः <ls>T. S.</ls>; <ls>Mu. 5. 10.</ls> {@--5@} (In <ab>gram.</ab>) An exception.
